Finance

MainNewsin the fieldFinance♪ Minfin's latest decisions. Analytical articles and expert opinions.Financial financialprojections.

The Bank of Russia explained price increases in the Australian stores
Considered December.
14:56, 25 January
Part of the population Bashkills will receive 750,000 roubles
In Bashkiria, the adoption of documents to receive payments from young agro specialists is under way. Financial support will be 750,000 roubles.
14:47, 25 January
Minfin had to pay a tax on the supervening even bankruptcy.
The Russian Federation has a time limit for the payment of taxes on excess profits. The business is due to pay until 28 January 2024, and this is the case of the closed companies.
12:46, 25 January
Police officers in the Murmansk region will begin to receive extra payments
The region ' s patrol and post would receive a monthly supplement of 10,000 roubles from the regional budget. Governor Andrei Chibis stated that decision in his social media.
12:16, 25 January
ANNOUNCE: Against the backdrop of lower price expectations, the BC rate probably reached a peak.
In January, the inflationary expectations of Rossian declined from 14.2 per cent to 12.7 per cent, although company surveys indicate an increase in inflationary risks. The population ' s inflation showed a decline from 17 per cent to 16.3 per cent. However, experts do not predict that lowering expectations will have a significant impact on the February decision of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation at the key rate. The regulator is likely to leave it at 16 percent.
23:41, 24 January
Rostock investors are expected to fall below $20,000 by the end of the year
Private investors are expected to fall below $20,000 by the end of 2024. The financial conglomerate of the Deutsche Bank came to this conclusion by analysing the results of the study.
23:01, 24 January
The arm grew to the United States dollar and fell to the euro after their dynamics in the global market
On 24 January, the Rubl grew slightly to the dollar and cheaper to the euro on the world currency market. As a result, the United States exchange rate in Mosbirje was 88.61 roubles, the cost of the euro increased to 96.61 roubles.
2200, 24 January
Binance terminates all operations with RF rubles as of 1 February
The world ' s largest cryptobirga Binance announced the termination of any Russian currency transactions since 31 January 2024. The publication concerned has issued a trade area.
19:58, 24 January
The economist called an asset that would soon replace the United States dollar.
Economist Valentine Catasones explained what asset would change the dollar when the United States was experiencing a massive economic crisis and the United States exchange rate would fall sharply.
18:55, 24 January
In the CB, RF stated that the inflationary expectations of Rossian were sharply reduced in January
At the Central Bank of the Russian Federation, the inflationary expectations of Russian citizens were drastically reduced in January 2024. The indicator declined from 14.2% to 12.7%.
18:07, 24 January
RF citizens reported how to pay the money properly to return them.
Russia explained how it was right to pay money to pay back.
17:32, 24 January
The Central Bank of the Russian Federation made an important explanation to all those who have credit.
The Central Bank of the Russian Federation has made important clarifications to all Rosians who have a loan since 21 January 2024.
17:10, 24 January
The Astrakhan region will send almost 5 billion roubles to repair roads and bridges
The carriageways are also planning to build from scratch.
14:24, 24 January
The Prime Minister of Nazarov expressed the Bashkira salary growth limits.
Payments in Bashkiria increased by 15.4 per cent for January-October 2023 and amounted to 54,943 roubles on average.
12:21, 24 January
RSB is preparing to launch the digital rouble
The Bank of Russia, working on the implementation of the digital rouble, is planning to establish a special client support line that will use the new platform.
11:21, 24 January
En+ estimated 100 billion roubles of investments in the wind in Priamurje
En+ Group assesses the capital investment in the project of the largest wind fleet in the Russian Federation, which should be located in Amur province, in 100 billion roubles.
11:19, 24 January
Bitcoin falls below $39,000 as market pressure increases
The cost of the batcoin fell below $39,000 against the backdrop of increased market pressure.
23:11, 23 January
Putin: If the mechanism for the return of foreign exchange earnings to the Russian Federation does not work, it will be fined.
President Vladimir Putin stated that the difficulties encountered in implementing the mechanism for the return of foreign exchange earnings from exporters would be adjusted.
21:00, 23 January
Prodanova ' s economist reported that the strengthening of the rouble would lower the price of the FS
The Russian national currency continues to demonstrate strengthening. Economist, Professor G. V. Plejanova Natalia Prodanova, said that the factors that strengthen the rubles would remain at least until 31 March 2024.
20:33, 23 January
Chinese banks have strengthened verification procedures for payments from the Russian Federation
China ' s banking organizations have strengthened verification procedures for international payments to the ICPD, but this is a good practice that has no impact on the receipt of payments in the yuan by foreign counterparts.
19:58, 23 January
